rules.ruleName: Maximum number of established simultaneous connections
rules.ruleDescription: The rule allows monitoring the number of simultaneous connections allowed for a specific component.

SoSs.description: Smart Grid Ecosystem is composed of different Devices knoem also ad Subsystems or Constituents.

devices.description: The ICT Gateway (ICTGTW) is a device, i.e., an Autonomous Subsystem, intended for Smart Grids that acts as mediator between data sourcing, actuation subsystems and domain applications.

devices.description: Graphical User Interface (GUI) allows the DSO operators to interact with the ICT GW and, mostly, its applications. The GUI provides input and output (mostly visualization) for all domain applications and for ICT Gateway functionalities.
